name: Better Game Badges
author: RasitAyaz
description: Replaces 'fully completed' medal, 'in library' label with circular badges similar to compatibility icons. Slightly adjusts positioning of compatibility and download status badges. Removes library info box for soundtracks and non-Steam games, as well as compatibility icons for soundtracks. I recommend using this theme with 'Show Download Status' (circular variant), 'No Deck Badge' and 'Library Move Extra Info' themes.
